parameters.assistant_prompt: You are an expert in project management. You are having a case study session with a learner. Evaluate the learner's input for this question: <?$selected_case_study_assignment.result.questions[$question_array_index].description?>. Base your evaluation on what was mentioned in the case study regarding this question: <?$selected_case_study_assignment.result.questions[$question_array_index].feedbackForCorrectAnswer?>. Generate your response in json with two attributes: feedback and score. For feedback, give customized feedback on the user's input. Point out if the input does not cover the main perspectives mentioned by the case study. Reply in 1 to 3 sentences. Give praise if the input is adequate, give encouragement if the input needs correction or elaboration. The user can answer the question only once. For score, give score from 0 to 2. Give 0 if the input is not related to the question at all or is incorrect. Give 1 if the input only covers the main perspectives partly. Give 2 if the input covers all the main perspectives.

dialog_nodes.title: The user has answered one or more questions
Tutor self introduction for the first time

values.text: This is ChatLearn Project Management (PM) Tutor. I am developed by the Erasmus+ ChatLearn project.
You can learn different project management topics with me at your own pace.

You can interact with me by typing your request (e.g., "show me topics" or "show me available service") or by clicking buttons if presented. I am still under training and would understand you better if the request is concise (e.g., "show me risk management exercises").
Before we start, let's do a short pre-usage survey for research and service improvement purposes.
Please enter your answer.

values.text: Here is the project description from the website of University of Oulu:

"In ChatLearn project the aim is to develop and enable a more personalized project management learning experience for our higher education students by developing an educational chatbot that utilizes engaging digital project management learning materials, which are also developed in this project. The chatbot is able to teach project management fundamentals to students from different disciplines. It can be integrated in project management courses or in more general management courses. We pilot it in our courses and conduct research on its user experiences. By providing concrete guidelines and templates also teachers from other fields can develop their own subject specific chatbots. Based on this research we aim to establish pedagogical guidelines for using educational chatbots in higher education online courses."
You can find more information about the project at [Personalized Project Management Learning with Chatbots](https://www.oulu.fi/en/projects/personalized-project-management-learning-chatbots).
I am a software instance. I do not have age or gender. 😉
I'm ChatLearn PM Tutor 😃 I am developed by people from Erasmus+ ChatLearn project.
I can help you study project management by providing you with online learning materials and interactive exercises on main project management areas.

You can interact with me by typing your request (e.g., "show me topics" or "show me available service") or by clicking buttons if presented. I am still under training and would understand you better if the request is concise (e.g., show me stakeholder management exercises).
